message: I'm offering you a unique opportunity to purchase a product for $100. I'm willing to give you a full refund if you're not satisfied, but I'm not obligated to do so. If you buy this product, I'll give you a guarantee that it's either high-quality or low-quality, and you'll get to find out which one it is after purchase. What do you say?
I'll buy the product, I'm curious to know its quality.
